Interior design director for Orange Hotel Group: www.orangehotel.com.cn 
 
Must be able to SPEAK Mandarin fluently.  
 
Responsibilities:  
 
-To meet set target and schedule by making plans for Interior Design line and ensure design works are carried out in order.  
-Take charge of and manage design projects of different types of orange hotel in north China area.  
-Coordinate Interior Design line and other departments and cities, ensure design works are done smoothly in quality.  
-Take charge of performance assessment for your department.  
-Know how to do creative design under limit budget  
 
The Successful Applicant:  
 
-Interior Design or relative major required, Bachelor degree or above.  
-Over 10 years experience in middle to large office design and management.  
-Abundant experience in construction documentary, cost control and material setting, understand construction technology and joints well.  
-A responsible person and communicate well, led a team before and have capability in management and coordination.  
-Excellently creative with strong painting foundation and hand drawing ability, better from design company or design institute.  
 
Please send detailed resume and portfolio.
title: Interior Design Director for Hotels in China
